description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Amsterdam 2016
http://gotoams.nl

Ted Neward - Ted is a Big Geek

ABSTRACT
Ever wished you could just focus on one language, and use that one language across all the various tiers and layers of your application, without creating a monstrous bloated mess?
If you're willing to have that "one language" be Javascript [...]

Read the full abstract here:
https://gotocon.com/amsterdam-2016/presentation/Busy%20Developer's%20Guide%20to%20MeteorJS

title: GOTO 2016 • Busy Developer's Guide to MeteorJS • Ted Neward
